dict.acceptation: 站立，起立；竖直放置；保持看法；停滞；
使站立；忍受；抵御；承担责任；

sent.orig: Numbers of fine trees existing in stand roughing and transforming stand to be a seed stand.
sent.trans: 林分内个体间差异极大，存在着一批优良木，经去劣疏伐可将林分改造成母树林。

sent.orig: I can stand it. I can stand anything. I've had to stand so much.
sent.trans: 我倒是经得祝我什么都经得祝我还得经受许多许多呢。

sent.orig: We would have to sell the North Stand, the West Stand and maybe the South Stand.
sent.trans: （如果买下罗纳尔多）我们将不得不卖掉北边的看台，西边的看台，也许还得搭上南边的看台。

sent.orig: A sponge with a metal stand (936A) or plastic stand (936C) included.
sent.trans: 配金属烙铁座(936A)或塑料烙铁座(936C)及高温海棉。

sent.orig: Position the mic stand on the floor near the hi-hat mic stand.
sent.trans: 把麦克架架在踩镲麦架附近的地板上。
